var pingdao = [
  "type/1",
  "type/2",
  "type/3",
  "type/4",
  "type/5",
  "type/6"
]

var nianfen = [
  "",
  "2025",
  "2024",
  "2023",
  "2022",
  "2021",
  "2020",
  "2010%2C2019",
  "2000%2C2009",
  "1990%2C1999",
  "1980%2C1989",
  "1970%2C1979",
  "1960%2C1969",
  "1800%2C1959"
]
   
function PING() {	
	v = String(this.source.getVariable()).split(",");
 x =String(v[0]);
 return pingdao[x]
}

function NIAN() {	
	v = String(this.source.getVariable()).split(",");
 x =String(v[1]);
 return nianfen[x]
}
